params._treasuryAddress: The address of the treasury contract
params.nrnAddress: The address of the Neuron contract
params.rankedBattleAddress: The address of the RankedBattle contract

returns._0: Amount of NRN tokens at risk for the fighter in the current round.

reclaimNRN(uint256,uint256,address).details: This function can only be called by the RankedBattle contract to reclaim NRN tokens from the stake at risk.This gets triggered when they win a match while having NRNs at risk.

params.nrnToReclaim: The amount of NRN tokens to reclaim.

setNewRound(uint256).details: This function can only be called by the RankedBattle contract to set a new round for staking.At the end of a round, it sweeps all NRNs held in this contract and sends it to treasury.

params.roundId_: The ID of the new round.

updateAtRiskRecords(uint256,uint256,addr.details: This function can only be called by the RankedBattle contract to update the stake at risk records for a fighter.This gets triggered when the fighter has 0 points and loses (i.e. goes into deficit).

params.nrnToPlaceAtRisk: The amount of NRN tokens to place at risk.

amountLost(address).notice: Mapping of address to the amount of NRNs that have been swept.

constructor.notice: Sets the contract addresses for the Neuron, Treasury, and RankedBattle contracts. Instantiates the Neuron contract.

getStakeAtRisk(uint256).notice: Gets the stake at risk for a specific fighter in the current round.

reclaimNRN(uint256,uint256,address).notice: Reclaims NRN tokens from the stake at risk.

setNewRound(uint256).notice: Sets a new round for staking

stakeAtRisk(uint256,uint256).notice: Maps the roundId to the fighterId to the stake at risk for that fighter.

totalStakeAtRisk(uint256).notice: Maps the roundId to the total stake at risk for that round.

updateAtRiskRecords(uint256,uint256,addr.notice: Updates the stake at risk records for a fighter.

documentation.text: @notice Event emitted when NRNs are reclaimed from this contract (after a win in ranked).
@notice Event emitted when more NRNs are placed at risk.
@notice Maps the roundId to the total stake at risk for that round.
@notice Maps the roundId to the fighterId to the stake at risk for that fighter.
@notice Mapping of address to the amount of NRNs that have been swept.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Not authorized to set new round"

arguments.value: Not authorized to set new round

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Not authorized to set new round"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Call must be from RankedBattle contract"

arguments.value: Call must be from RankedBattle contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call must be from RankedBattle contract"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Fighter does not have enough stake at risk"

arguments.value: Fighter does not have enough stake at risk

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Fighter does not have enough stake at risk"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Call must be from RankedBattle contract"

arguments.value: Call must be from RankedBattle contract

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Call must be from RankedBattle contract"

documentation.text:
@notice Sweeps the lost stake to the treasury contract.
 @dev This function is called internally to transfer the lost stake to the treasury contract.
